name: The Honorable Albert W. SHEPPARD, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and Robert P. Casey, Jr., State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents

judges: Chief Justice CAPPY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: The Honorable Albert W. SHEPPARD, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and Robert P. Casey, Jr., State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of October 2006, this matter is DISMISSED AS MOOT. See Stilp v. Commonwealth, 588 Pa. 539, 905 A.2d 918 (2006). Jurisdiction relinquished.
Chief Justice CAPPY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
906 A.2d 1195
The Honorable Albert W. SHEPPARD, Jr., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and Robert P. Casey, Jr., State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 5, 2006.
